feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:36 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 6:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: NE 19 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
